Description.Text: Located just 100 yards from the gondola and the powdery slopes, La Casa blends relaxation and recreation. Boasting high soaring ceilings, expansive multi-level space, distinguished furnishings and spectacular views of Mt. Werner from private balconies, La Casa is an ideal choice for ski vacations, intimate retreats or festive holiday gatherings. Our multi-level 2-, 3- and 4-bedroom accommodations include a washer and dryer, gas fireplace, an extra guest bath and more. Outdoor hot tubs, a shuttle service (ski season only) to shopping and dining as well as our signature guest service will ensure that you enjoy a pampered lifestyle while youâ€™re here. With its mountainous terrain and snow-filled winters, the Steamboat Springs area offers world-class skiing and winter activities fit for the entire family and people of all ages and skill levels. Summer visitors can enjoy great hiking, biking, fishing, water sports and other outdoor activities that showcase the natural beauty of this location.Minimum age at check-in is 21.
